description:
[h1]Scrapfarer[/h1]

Get to the end and find the treasure! Most testers never got close, so if anyone legitimately finishes the game I commend you.

It's a whole new game, good luck :)

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Features[/h2]
[list]
    [*]8 stages
    [*]New parts
    [*]New gameplay loop
    [*]25 blocks
    [*]Hours of suffering
[/list] 

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Other[/h2]
Had to rush the release a bit because I want to work on other things, but it's playable. Also works in multiplayer, bit buggy, put bugs on the [url=https://github.com/Woukie/Scrapfarer]GitHub[/url].

[b][MODDERS][/b] If you fork the mod, make sure to change the mod id. And add something cool don't be lame and just re-upload it.

[hr][/hr]

This is probably going to be my last mod, I'll accept pull requests if they're good.
name: Scrapfarer
